docs.lead_paragraph: A few months ago, I posted an email from a young woman named Emmie who was 23 years old, single, about to enter a competitive graduate school program, and unexpectedly pregnant. She was looking for advice - should she terminate the pregnancy, place the baby for adoption, or raise the child herself? More than 1,000 of you wrote first with advice and counsel; then, when she decided to have an abortion, hundreds more wrote expressing either sympathy or anger.
docs.abstract: A young woman who finds herself pregnant is looking for advice on things like how to tell her family, and what to do about health insurance.
docs.snippet: A young woman who finds herself pregnant is looking for advice on things like how to tell her family, and what to do about health insurance.

docs.lead_paragraph: I've just come back from the predator capital of Europe: Romania. The forests and mountains there are home to most of Europe's remaining bears and lynx and wolves, oh my! (I didn't see any of them, but I did see evidence of bears - scat, and a fresh pawprint.)

headline.main: Where Tasty Morsels Fear to Tread

docs.abstract: Predators exert a profound influence not only on the lives of many creatures, but on the very landscape of an area's flora and fauna.
docs.snippet: Predators exert a profound influence not only on the lives of many creatures, but on the very landscape of an area's flora and fauna.

docs.lead_paragraph: Some women and providers have become so concerned about negative effects of drugs that they have forgotten the negative effects of the diseases they are intended to treat.
